thread.title: Priya Belliappa debuts baby picture
thread.title_full: Priya Belliappa debuts baby picture - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Priya Belliappa debuts baby picture
text:
Kannada Filmmaker Priya Belliappa has chosen a novel method to announce the birth of her baby. In a picture collage that she posted online Priya used images from each month of her pregnancy, clad in the same black tee and brown shorts, with a final image of her holding her newborn in the same outfit.
Here's wishing the new mother all the best!
